mapper.sql: id, ranking_type_id, sale_consultant_id, sale_consultant_name, sales_volume, satisfaction_degree, create_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sales_ranking_qa
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sales_ranking_qa (id, ranking_type_id, sale_consultant_id, sale_consultant_name, sales_volume, satisfaction_degree, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rankingTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleConsultantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleConsultantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesVolume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{satisfactionDegree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,

sales_volume,

mapper.update:
update sales_ranking_qa
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ranking_type_id = #{record.rankingTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sale_consultant_id = #{record.saleConsultantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sale_consultant_name = #{record.saleConsultantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sales_volume = #{record.salesVolume,jdbcType=INTEGER},
satisfaction_degree = #{record.satisfactionDegree,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update sales_ranking_qa set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ranking_type_id = #{record.rankingTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_consultant_id = #{record.saleConsultantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_consultant_name = #{record.saleConsultantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sales_volume = #{record.salesVolume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, satisfaction_degree = #{record.satisfactionDegree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update sales_ranking_qa
ranking_type_id = #{rankingTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sale_consultant_id = #{saleConsultantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sale_consultant_name = #{saleConsultantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sales_volume = #{salesVolume,jdbcType=INTEGER},
satisfaction_degree = #{satisfactionDegree,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sales_ranking_qa set ranking_type_id = #{rankingTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_consultant_id = #{saleConsultantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_consultant_name = #{saleConsultantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sales_volume = #{salesVolume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, satisfaction_degree = #{satisfactionDegree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sales_ranking_qa(id,ranking_type_id,sale_consultant_id,sale_consultant_name,sales_volume,satisfaction_degree,create_time) SELECT UUID(),ranking_type_id,sale_consultant_id,sale_consultant_name,sales_volume,satisfaction_degree,NOW() FROM (SELECT id AS ranking_type_id,time,dealer_id,vehicle_model_id FROM sales_ranking_type)srt, (SELECT sale_consultant_name,COUNT(*) AS sales_volume,ROUND(AVG(score)) AS satisfaction_degree,sale_consultant_id,dealer_id,vehicle_model_id,time FROM (SELECT id AS a_salesRewordId,sale_consultant_id,sale_consultant_name,dealer_id,vehicle_model_id,buy_date, CONCAT(YEAR(#{beginDate}),'-',MONTH(#{beginDate})) AS time FROM sales_record )a, (SELECT score,sales_record_id AS b_salesRewordId FROM reward_record )b WHERE a_salesRewordId = b_salesRewordId AND buy_date BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY sale_consultant_id,dealer_id,vehicle_model_id)c WHERE srt.dealer_id = c.dealer_id AND srt.vehicle_model_id = c.vehicle_model_id AND srt.time = c.time

INSERT INTO sales_ranking_qa(id,ranking_type_id,sale_consultant_id,sale_consultant_name,sales_volume,satisfaction_degree,create_time) SELECT UUID(),ranking_type_id,sale_consultant_id,sale_consultant_name,sales_volume,satisfaction_degree,NOW() FROM (SELECT id AS ranking_type_id,time,dealer_id,vehicle_model_id FROM sales_ranking_type)srt, (SELECT sale_consultant_name,COUNT(*) AS sales_volume,ROUND(AVG(score)) AS satisfaction_degree,sale_consultant_id,dealer_id,time FROM (SELECT id AS a_salesRewordId,sale_consultant_id,sale_consultant_name,dealer_id,buy_date, CONCAT(YEAR(#{beginDate}),'-',MONTH(#{beginDate})) AS time FROM sales_record )a, (SELECT score,sales_record_id AS b_salesRewordId FROM reward_record )b WHERE a_salesRewordId = b_salesRewordId AND buy_date BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY sale_consultant_id,dealer_id)c WHERE srt.dealer_id = c.dealer_id AND srt.vehicle_model_id IS NULL AND srt.time = c.time
